data.message: hello facebook,  yesterday i got a message from a jaun thomas claiming that i had won a prize of 500,000 from facebook. but then fedex wanted 400 to deliver this. scam or what? does jaun thomas work for you?

replies.message: Hey there, this looks like a hoax message. We recommend that you do not provide any personal or financial information to the sender and report the spam to us by following these steps: http://on.fb.me/1VsYV2U. Thanks for helping us keep Facebook a safe place! -Kate

he is very persistant, still even. this is what his last message said I want you to know that your package is ready for delivry. And Note, the promotional program is withing the Facebook CEO, promotional manager and the promotional agent.
